translation.en: ♪ Hey ♪
[Alan] You know, this Lamaze class got me concerned.
translation.zh: ‎这个心理助产课让我好担心

translation.en: Is there really a chance that you're gonna stop breathin' while givin' birth?
translation.zh: ‎你真的会在分娩时停止呼吸吗？

translation.en: -What? -Like everything is going great,
translation.zh:
‎当一切都很顺利
‎我在旁边叫着“一二三”

translation.en: and I'm like, "One, two, three," and your face turns blue,
translation.zh:
‎当一切都很顺利
‎我在旁边叫着“一二三” ‎你会突然脸色发紫

translation.en: and you stop breathing, I'm like, "Breathe! Breathe!" [laughs]
translation.zh:
‎停止呼吸
‎我转而拼命喊“呼吸！呼吸！”

translation.en: Alan, it's about us being ready.
translation.zh: ‎艾伦 重要的是有心理准备

translation.en: It's about us doing this together.
Well, you know, girl, doing this together is what got us here in the first place.
translation.zh:
‎正因为我们一起做了
‎才会怀孕

translation.en: Except your breathing was more like, "Oh, Alan!
translation.zh:
‎区别在于你的呼吸更像是 ‎-“哦 艾伦 哦 你太棒了！”
‎-艾伦

translation.en: -Oh, it's amazing!" -Alan.
translation.zh:
‎-“哦 艾伦 哦 你太棒了！”
‎-艾伦

translation.en: -"Oh, Alan, it's so big!" -Alan!
-"It's so big!" -Stop it! You're being ridiculous!
Oh, I gotta get back to work. It's the last day before maternity leave.
translation.zh: ‎哦 我得回单位了 ‎今天是产假前的最后一天

translation.en: -I'm gonna miss work. -Yeah, I wish I could say the same.
translation.zh: ‎我会想念工作的 ‎真希望我也能这么想

translation.en: -Linda's on a warpath. -Oh.
Apparently, Doug pitched a new holiday e-card, and it didn't go so well.
translation.zh:
‎看来她并不喜欢
‎道格新想出的电子贺卡文案

translation.en: Babe, who's gonna send an e-card
for someone graduating from rehab for the second time?
Well, it was a lot better than "Happy Hoe-loween".
You know, for women that wear slutty costumes.
Or what about "White Kwanzaa," which makes absolutely no sense at all.
translation.zh:
‎还有什么“白色宽扎节”
‎完全不知所云

translation.en: And don't forget to tell Linda you're taking paternity leave.
I know. Listen, nothing's more important to me than my family,
not even a partnership
at the company I've been busting my ass for all these years.
You think maybe I should've just slept my way to the top?
Okay, babe. I'll see you later.
Don't think Linda want it? You see the way Linda looks at your boy!
translation.zh:
‎你觉得琳达不感冒吗？ ‎-你知道琳达看我的眼神
‎-这话题我不感兴趣

translation.en: -Not interested in that conversation. -Don't be jealous.
translation.zh:
‎-你知道琳达看我的眼神
‎-这话题我不感兴趣 ‎别吃醋

translation.en: -I love you. -[Marie] Love you, too.
Bye.
Linda, I wanna apologize for the pitch.
translation.zh: ‎琳达 我想为那文案道歉

translation.en: You know, I've been delegating more to the team, and I want...
translation.zh:
‎最近我更多让手下负责
‎打算要…

translation.en: Y-You know, 'cause the baby's due soon--
I know you got a lot on your plate, Alan.
translation.zh: ‎我知道你现在很忙 艾伦

translation.en: I won't pretend to understand, I never wanted babies. Ick!
translation.zh:
‎我理解不了
‎因为我从没想要孩子

translation.en: [stammers] You know, um...
I-I-I don't usually drink at work.
-[slurps] -Oh, damn.
Alan. There was a time when you took charge.
translation.zh: ‎艾伦 你负责的那段时间

translation.en: You were aggressive. You dressed the part.
You were becoming the face of this company, literally!
translation.zh: ‎你成了名副其实的公司门面 ！

translation.en: Now... everything's about...
translation.zh: ‎现在 你满脑子都是孩子

translation.en: Linda, that's what I wanted to talk to you about.
translation.zh: ‎琳达 我正要跟你谈这事

translation.en: [stammers] I'm gonna be taking some time off.
-What? -Just a month or so.
It's like paternity leave.
[Linda] Paternity leave?!
You're in line for a partnership.
Do you really think, Alan, this is the right time to vacay?
It's not a vacay. I just want to be there for my family.
translation.zh: ‎这不是度假 我只是想陪陪家人

translation.en: And you know what? That partnership, I earned it.
translation.zh: ‎再说了 合作人是我应得的

translation.en: Now, I have a baby appointment, and I promised Marie I'd be there.
translation.zh: ‎我约了产前检查 ‎答应过玛丽会去

translation.en: [Linda] Fine!
[mocking] Go to your little appointment with your sonogram and your gel.
translation.zh:
‎去做你的产前检查
‎摆弄那些声像仪和凝胶吧

translation.en: [Dr. Greenberg] Everything looks great.
Right where you'd expect to be at 35 weeks.
-[Marie chuckles] -Thank you. Lights, please.
Now, because of your advanced maternal age--
Uh, I'm only 35.
-And 35 is really 15 in Black-people age. -Mm-hmm.
You know that black don't crack...
[both] ...unless you smoke it. Okay?
Sure, but 35 is still considered an elevated risk pregnancy.
translation.zh: ‎没错 但35岁还是属于高危妊娠

translation.en: -Uh, no pre-eclampsia in your family? -No.
translation.zh:
‎-你家族里没有前兆子痫吧？
‎-没有

translation.en: -No food allergies? No history of cancer? -No.
No, she has A-plus genes.
translation.zh:
‎-没有 她是优等基因
‎-没有

translation.en: You know, her daddy's a federal judge.
She graduated top of her class at Columbia Law,
translation.zh:
‎她以名列前茅的成绩
‎毕业于哥伦比亚法学院

translation.en: and she's the first female partner in her firm.
Hey, Doc... I trapped her.
-Uh, one more thing... -[Marie] Hmm?
Alan... we don't have your family history.
translation.zh: ‎艾伦 我们没有你的家族史

translation.en: Oh, well, there's a perfectly good explanation for that. I don't have one.
translation.zh: ‎我有充足的理由可以解释 ‎我没有家族

translation.en: See, I was put up for adoption, and I was raised in foster homes.
translation.zh:
‎我是被领养的
‎在不同的寄养家庭里长大

translation.en: I moved around a lot. I never really met my birth mother.
translation.zh: ‎搬过很多次 从没见过生母

translation.en: Hence, no family medical history.
[Marie] But...
he checked out great after his last physical.
That's right. You are lookin' at one perfect human specimen.
translation.zh:
‎没错
‎站在你面前的是完美的人类样本

translation.en: Now, what more could you ask for?
Girl!
-Look at that! -[Marie laughs]
-Little baby gonna come out buff. [grunts] -[growls]
[Alan] Why can't they just put it in the chart,
"Don't know family medical history"?
She has to ask. She's not judging you, baby.
translation.zh:
‎她必须得问你
‎她对你没有成见

translation.en: So what if I don't know if my family has high blood pressure or diabetes,
translation.zh: ‎我不知道又能怎样？ ‎管他们是否有高血压、糖尿病

translation.en: or the gene that gives you the little webby thing between your toes
translation.zh: ‎管他们是否有高血压、糖尿病 ‎或者那种会长脚蹼

translation.en: that makes it impossible to wear flip-flops?
Listen, black people don't even wear flip-flops.
You're right, baby, we don't.
Makes our heel hard and our baby toe ashy.
translation.zh:
‎那会使我们的脚后跟长老茧
‎小脚拇指发白

translation.en: You know, and I've tried every DNA website there is.
I mean, all I found out was I may be related to Cleopatra...
translation.zh:
‎只查到了
‎也许我和埃及艳后是亲戚

translation.en: and I'm 1/23 Irish.
Alan, my father is a federal circuit judge.
translation.zh: ‎艾伦 我父亲是联邦巡回法官

translation.en: I've told you this a million times.
He'd be happy to help you find your family.
translation.zh: ‎他很愿意帮你找到你的家人

translation.en: No. No, Marie.
That man don't like me.
He stopped liking you after you started liking me.
translation.zh:
‎你开始喜欢我后
‎他也不喜欢你了

translation.en: I don't wanna owe that man anything.
Look, Alan.
If this is as important to you as you say it is,
now is the perfect time to ask.
translation.zh: ‎现在是求他帮忙的绝佳时机

translation.en: [Alan] Who has a Sunday brunch on a Saturday?
translation.zh:
‎谁会在周六吃早午饭？
‎大家都周日吃

translation.en: Not even white folks do that.
[Marie] My mom insisted.
[Alan] Aw, I love your mommy.
Only thing I don't like about your mommy is your daddy.
translation.zh:
‎唯一不喜欢你妈妈的点
‎是你爸爸

translation.en: Surprise!
Mommy!
-Oh, my little Pooh Bear! -Oh!
Never surprise a pregnant lady.
Don't y'all know that?
-Yeah, my water almost broke. -[Janet] Marie.
translation.zh:
‎-是呀 我的羊水差点吓破了
‎-玛丽

translation.en: The whole family is here for you.
Really?
Your sisters, every aunt, uncle, cousin!
translation.zh:
‎你的姐妹们
‎所有的叔叔阿姨 堂表兄妹

translation.en: -Cousins, cousins, cousins. -Oh, Mom.
translation.zh:
‎-表弟 表妹 堂兄 堂姐
‎-妈妈

translation.en: -This is like a Tyler Perry movie in here. -Oh, stop it.
[Alan] So, Doug, your date, she seems really, um...
translation.zh: ‎道格 你的女伴看起来有点…

translation.en: -outgoing. -Oh, yeah.
-She's a Russian aerial dancer. -[Alan] Okay.
-You know, like with ribbons? -Yeah, yeah.
That, or she's a spy.
Or maybe she's just a thief. I'm not sure.
translation.zh: ‎或许只是个小偷 我不确定

translation.en: But I'm keeping my sensitive documents in a safe just in case.
translation.zh:
‎但我把所有重要文件都放在保险箱里
‎以防万一

translation.en: Smart man.
-Doug. -Marie.
Oh, thank you so much for coming!
Oh, such a great shower!
-And these mommy-mosas are on fleek. -[Marie] Right?
-We don't say that. -Mm-mm.
Uh, off the chain.
-That's old. -No.
-They're the bomb. -[Alan and Marie] Stop.
Uh, shit, she's stealing.
-[Marie] What? -Excuse me.
-[speaking Russian] Nyet, nyet, nyet. -Da.
So...
Dad's at the grill,
so now's the perfect chance to talk to him.
-Hey. -Hmm?
-Dad, I was... -Ooh.
Sorry. Judge...
-Mm-hmm. -[Alan] Sir.
I got something I wanted to talk to you about.
You know, I wasn't exactly in favor
of you marrying my daughter.
You kind of mentioned that during the wedding,
translation.zh: ‎没错 婚礼上你算是提到过

translation.en: when the preacher said, "Speak now or forever hold your peace."
translation.zh:
‎当牧师说 “有异议的请现在提出
‎否则请永远保持缄默”

translation.en: You... you didn't hold your peace.
Alan, I'm trying to make sure that you understand that you're...
you're about to become the father of my grandchild.
translation.zh: ‎你即将成为我外孙女的父亲

translation.en: I know this. And that-- that-- Sir.
[stammering] I leased a brand new SUV.
translation.zh: ‎我租了一辆全新的多功能车

translation.en: It's red, so everybody knows it's coming.
Got the little "Baby On Board" sticker in the back,
translation.zh: ‎车尾贴了“车上有婴儿”的标语

translation.en: and I'm almost finished with the nursery.
I got a few finishing touches to put on, but--
-[sizzling] -[Leland] Damn it.
That's not what I'm talking about.
Son...
I want to share something with you.
Family is everything.
You don't have a family.
Now, Marie brings generations of success to the table.
translation.zh: ‎玛丽会将几代人的成功史 ‎带给孩子

translation.en: What exactly are you bringing?
I can throw with both arms.
-You can throw with both arms? -Mm-hmm.
Listen, sir.
I want to find my birth family.
But see, I need a court order
to unseal my adoption records.
-Well, just so I'm clear... -Yes.
-So I'm clear... -Mm-hmm.
You're asking me for a favor?
Not a favor. Like a... "Favor" is a big word.
Like... adjust it. A "solid".
No, no. I wanna hear "favor." "Solid" doesn't work here.
translation.zh:
‎不行 我想听你说“请我帮忙”
‎不是行个方便

translation.en: Can we not say "favor" so hard?
translation.zh: ‎可以不把“帮忙”说得这么重吗？

translation.en: "Judge, could you do me a favor?" Can you say something like that?
translation.zh:
‎你能不能说
‎“法官 我想请你帮个忙”？

translation.en: Can you do me a f--
Can you do me a favor?
There you go.
There you go. That wasn't that hard, was it?
-It was. -It was actually easier
than I thought it was going to be.
You...You know, you...
You're not much of a fighter, are you, son?
-Hmm? -No.
[Marie chuckles] What is this?
Aw! How cute is this?
Alan, look.
You know, I've been trying to get that information for years,
translation.zh: ‎我试图得到这些信息好多年了

translation.en: and your father got it in less than an hour.
translation.zh:
‎你爸花了不到一小时
‎全都弄来了

translation.en: Open it.
Marie, now... Now, once I open this, y-y-you know there's no going back.
translation.zh:
‎玛丽 一旦我打开了
‎就无法回头了

translation.en: Open the damn thing!
Um, Marie...
my whole life I always wondered what my birth family was like.
translation.zh:
‎我一直好奇着
‎自己的原生家庭

translation.en: Where'd they come from? Were they poor? And... And they worked hard,
translation.zh:
‎他们家乡是哪儿？是否贫穷？
‎是否努力工作

translation.en: and then they started a successful dry cleaning company,
[stammers] and then they got rich,
and they moved across town to the East side,
and then they bought a deluxe apartment--
Alan.
That's The Jeffersons. I know, but a boy could dream.
translation.zh:
‎-这是《杰斐逊一家》的剧情
‎-我懂 但想想没罪呀

translation.en: -Just open the dag-gone thing! -Okay! Don't yell at me.
translation.zh:
‎-打开这鬼东西！
‎-好了 别冲我吼

translation.en: [Marie] God! Just avoiding it.
Baby, this is just stuff. I can't... I can't make nothin' of this.
Okay, okay, all right. Records of Transfer...
Oh, my gosh, Alan. It's your birth certificate.
translation.zh: ‎天哪 艾伦 这是你的出生证明

translation.en: Look.
-[Alan] Oh, sh... Marie. -[Marie chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎（格鲁吉亚州 出生证明） ‎玛丽…

translation.en: It's my birth certificate. [stammers] This is me!
Yep, all five pounds and six ounces of you.
-Hey! That's a healthy baby! -That's a good baby.
-Yeah. -Yeah.
-A little slim. -Little slim.
Oh. No father on record.
Oh! Alan, look.
Your birth mother's name is right here.
Lynette Spellman.
Lynette?
Wow! You know any Lynettes?
Uh, no.
I know a Lynette. My barber, the one that cuts my hair?
translation.zh:
‎我的理发师就叫丽奈特 ‎-我的头发是她理的
‎-哦

translation.en: -Uh-huh. -She's a Lynette!
She faded it a little high, but I think she was high when she faded it.
translation.zh:
‎她把两边推得太高了
‎也许她当时抽高了

translation.en: -She did good. -Maybe my mom owns a salon!
translation.zh:
‎-她理得还好
‎-也许我妈妈开发廊！

translation.en: Maybe she invented the weave.
And you're wearin' a weave right now, and that's why I was attracted to you,
translation.zh:
‎你现在就是接发
‎所以我爱上了你

translation.en: 'cause you remind me of the weave that my mama created!
translation.zh:
‎因为你让我想起了
‎妈妈发明的接发

translation.en: [gasps] Oh, my God, maybe my mother's a millionaire!
Well, maybe you could ask her yourself.
Her address is right here.
-My-- -Look at this.
-I got a mommy. -You got a mama, baby.
translation.zh:
‎-我有妈妈了
‎-你有妈妈了 宝贝

translation.en: -I got a mama. -Baby.
-I got a mama. -Baby.
-Hey. -[Marie laughs]
-You got a grand-mommy! -You've got a grandma!
-But what if she doesn't wanna meet me? -How can she not wanna meet you?
translation.zh: ‎她不想见我怎么办？ ‎她怎么会不想见你？

translation.en: Now, listen, you better hurry up, or you'll miss your chance.
translation.zh: ‎快去见她吧 否则就没机会了

translation.en: 'Cause in a couple of weeks, you're gonna have to focus
translation.zh: ‎因为再过两个星期 你得集中精力

translation.en: on the family you have right here.
-Okay. -Okay?
Thank you.
Don't worry. I'll be back.
-Okay. -[engine turns over]
Probably in a helicopter, because, you know, my mama is ballin'!
translation.zh:
‎也许我会乘直升飞机回来
‎因为我妈很有钱

translation.en: Love you! A lot!
Bye, baby! And other baby!
translation.zh:
‎再见 宝贝儿！
‎还有肚子里的那个宝贝儿

translation.en: ♪ So, whatever ♪
What do I call her?
Hey... Mom!
I... I forgive you, Mom.
Yeah, I'm not even a little bitter that you wasn't around
translation.zh: ‎38年来 你一直不在我身边

translation.en: for the last 38 years, you frickin' bitch!
translation.zh: ‎我有点生气 你这个臭婊子！

translation.en: I'm sorry.
It's gonna be cool. It's gonna be good. Mm-hmm.
[man] Just leave the mail on the porch!
Oh, hey!
[man] You're not our usual mailman.
No, I'm-- I'm not with the Postal Service.
Sir, I am anxiously awaiting an episode of Mork & Mindy.
translation.zh:
‎先生 我正在焦急地等待
‎《默克与明蒂》剧集

translation.en: So, you leave me no choice to be somewhat rude
translation.zh: ‎所以我别无选择 只能对你粗鲁地说

translation.en: and say, "Please, go away!"
Who watches Mork & Mindy still?
[knocking] Sir!
Does Lynette Spellman live here?
No. And I'll say it in Spanish,
translation.zh: ‎不 我用西班牙语告诉你

translation.en: "El no."
Then, why is "L. Spellman" on the mailbox?
translation.zh: ‎那为什么邮箱上写着L·斯派曼？

translation.en: Very well.
But she's not here.
Really? Damn it.
What do you want?
My name is Alan,
and Lynette Spellman is my mother.
Lynette Spellman only has one son, and his name is Russell.
translation.zh:
‎丽奈特·斯派曼只有一个儿子
‎他叫罗素

translation.en: Right. I have proof.
What in the quantum leap?
Give me that.
This can't be.
I'm her son!
This... This is a mistake!
Wait, you're her son?
I'm her son. That means we're brothers!
translation.zh: ‎我是他儿子 所以我们是兄弟

translation.en: Wait. You're my brother, Russell!
translation.zh: ‎等一下 你是我兄弟 罗素

translation.en: No, no, no, no. No, no. Look, right there. You see that? See that?
translation.zh: ‎不 看这儿 看到没有？

translation.en: See that misprint? See that date there, that's my birthday.
translation.zh: ‎印错了日子 这是我的生日

translation.en: -And, see-- -Yeah, but that's my birthday.
Yeah, but that would only make sense if, in fact,
you and I were... [chuckles]
Twins.
We're twins.
Russell!
We're twins!
Come here, bro!
This is awkward.
I've never had a man hug me before.
If you don't release me, I'm gonna be forced to use my warning whistle
translation.zh: ‎赶快放开我 ‎否则我吹妈妈给的口哨了

translation.en: Mother gave me.
Okay, I warned you.
-[whistles] -All right, shh, shh! Hey!
-Stranger danger! Stranger danger! -[dogs barking]
Can we... Can we go inside?
Don't touch anything with your measly hands.
Everything here is very valuable.
These are antiques, especially the TV Guide,
translation.zh: ‎这些是古董 特别是电视节目表

translation.en: so it's gonna be worth billions one day.
Well, here's some more news.
-You're about to be an uncle. -Phooey.
-Uncle Russell. -That's a terrible name.
-Has a little ring to it. -Sounds like a cheesy morning disc jockey.
translation.zh: ‎挺顺口 ‎听起来像是个老套的清晨电台DJ

translation.en: This is the family home, huh?
Yeah. Jealous? [chuckles]
I still can't believe
that I'm standing here with my very own twin.
translation.zh: ‎我和自己的双胞胎兄弟站在一起

translation.en: [Russell] Me neither.
I mean, look at us.
We look exactly alike.
Yeah, we... We look almost...
exactly... nothing alike.
No, we look exactly, exactly alike.
translation.zh: ‎不 我们看起来一模一样

translation.en: It's like I'm looking at myself in the mirror.
It's uncanny!
Same face, same hairline.
translation.zh: ‎一样的面孔 一样的发际线

translation.en: Well, I'm a lot more handsome.
That's why I got the beauty marks and you don't. [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎我有这些美人斑 而你没有

translation.en: So, Russell, I...
take it you still live here.
[scoffs] That's a rather obvious observation.
Why else would I have my very own cereal bowl
with my name written on it?
-See? -Yeah.
It's so good. I love cereal. [slurps]
translation.zh:
‎真好吃 我喜欢吃麦片
‎它能给我…

translation.en: Well, that's something me and you have in common.
I like cereal, too.
I'm more of a Wheat Chex guy myself.
Wheat Chex?
I'm sorry, Alan. I like my cereals to be edible.
translation.zh:
‎抱歉！艾伦
‎我只吃咽得下去的麦片

translation.en: Preferably with the fruit-forward complexities
translation.zh: ‎最好是水果口味 ‎上尉碎莓儿童款

translation.en: of the Captain's Crunchberries.
So, when do I see her?
-Who? -[Alan] Mom.
I-I mean, Lynette.
When does she get back?
Uh... that's... that's rather hard to say.
Oh, I got so much stuff to ask her.
I mean, so many things I wanna tell her, like I'm married,
translation.zh:
‎好多事儿要告诉她
‎比如 我结婚了

translation.en: she's gonna be a grandma.
Uh, she's dead!
You said what?
Yeah, you know...
I regret to inform you...
Lynette Spellman has passed on.
How?
Car accident.
I told her she should check her brakes.
So she got up under that 1986 Honda Civic SE.
translation.zh:
‎所以她爬到那辆
‎86年本田思域的车底

translation.en: It was blue.
Periwinkle, to be exact.
She was just that type of gal,
real hands-on and cheap as the day is long.
Obviously, I couldn't do it for her.
Because of your size?
Because I know nothing about fancy, expensive, foreign cars like Hondas.
translation.zh:
‎因为我对像本田这样的
‎昂贵的外国车一无所知

translation.en: So-- So, she was crushed?
I'm afraid so.
Oh, wow.
Oh, this is just so devastating. Just--
Uh, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa. Come on.
-Oh, I'm-- I'm sorry. -That's my seat.
Sorry, Alan. I've spent a lot of time
translation.zh: ‎对不起！艾伦 我费了大功夫

translation.en: making this leather conform to only my buttocks.
translation.zh: ‎才让这皮座椅适应了我的屁股

translation.en: Can't believe I finally find her and now it's too late.
translation.zh:
‎好不容易找到她 却已经晚了
‎真是难以相信

translation.en: Maybe you should just go home and mourn.
Now, excuse me. My television show is on. Thank you.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉！电视节目时间到了 谢谢

translation.en: Do you have any pictures?
I hate havin' a brother already!
Don't touch my cereal.
I lived my entire life with that woman, and although buck-toothed,
translation.zh:
‎我跟这女人一辈子住一起
‎尽管她有点龅牙

translation.en: she was a saint.
And what about Dad?
Deserted her the instant she got pregnant.
translation.zh: ‎妈妈一怀孕 爸爸就走了

translation.en: But she carried on.
Seems like an amazing woman.
Indeed.
Sour ball?
Sure.
She never said anything about why she gave me up?
Never mentioned you.
Not a word. [chews]
Not a peep. [chuckles]
Oh, so sour.
[chomps] Ow! Ow!
[Russell] Seriously?
Did you just bite into a sour ball?
No wonder why Mother chose me.
Okay, fine. Can you just please get me a paper towel
translation.zh: ‎行了 帮我拿张纸巾行吗？

translation.en: for my busted tooth?
You know, Mom loves sour balls.
She said Dad had sour balls and that was her attraction to him.
translation.zh: ‎她说爸爸也吃酸甜球 ‎所以她爱上了他

translation.en: Hey, Alan!
Whatever you do,
don't go snoopin' through Mom's drawers.
She's got all kind of weird massagers and stuff in there.
translation.zh: ‎里面放着各式各样奇怪的按摩器

translation.en: Family medical records!
What the hell is this?
Again, not to push you, but to nudge you really hard,
Mork is about to talk to Orson and--
What's that?
Did you know about this?
She had six babies at the same time!
-There was more of you? -Russell, there's more of us!
translation.zh:
‎-还有更多像你这样的？
‎-罗素 ‎还有更多像我们这样的！

translation.en: Wait. So, if triplets is three, then...
translation.zh: ‎等一下 三胞胎是三个 那么…

translation.en: Russell...
we're sextuplets!
Holy fudge!
[Marie] Aw, baby, I'm really sorry about your birth mom.
translation.zh:
‎（布兰福德旅店） ‎宝贝 对于你生母的遭遇
‎我深表遗憾

translation.en: It's okay, baby.
At least I still got Dawn, Ethan, Jaspar, Russell, and Baby Pete.
translation.zh:
‎至少我还有道恩、伊森、贾斯帕尔、
‎罗素和婴儿皮特

translation.en: And, yes, Baby Pete is his legal name. [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎没错 婴儿皮特是他的合法名字

translation.en: That's more ghetto than your Uncle Lil Stank-Stank.
translation.zh: ‎比你叔叔利尔臭臭的名字还绝

translation.en: Yeah, so far, I found a place of business on Ethan,
translation.zh: ‎目前为止 我找到了伊森的公司

translation.en: and nothing on Jaspar. That man's a ghost.
translation.zh:
‎还没有贾斯帕尔的线索
‎这家伙是个幽灵

translation.en: What about Dawn?
I got a number. I called it.
-So, what happened? -[Alan] Some dude picked up.
Gave me a weird address in Alabama. Said I should bring cigarettes.
translation.zh:
‎给了我一个奇怪的阿拉巴马州地址
‎叫我带上烟

translation.en: Well, be careful. You don't know these people.
Maybe one of them changed their name to Idris Elba.
translation.zh:
‎也许我的一个兄弟改名成了
‎伊德瑞斯艾尔巴

translation.en: You know, we do have strikingly similar bone structure.
But Idris has all of his teeth.
Maybe I'll get a gold cap.
No, no, no, no. Alan. Please! You can't meet your family like that.
translation.zh: ‎不要 艾伦 ‎拜托！你不能这样去见家人

translation.en: Girl, that's why I got this.
Boom. Super glue.
-[Marie] Oh, my God, Alan. -[clattering] Don't use that. Go see a dentist.
translation.zh: ‎艾伦 别用这个 去看牙医

translation.en: -Baby... I'm gonna call you back. -Alan--
-[panting] -Russell!
Oh. Hey, Alan.
How'd you get in my room?
I just told the hotel manager we were brothers. [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎我跟旅店经理说我们是兄弟

translation.en: Of course he believed me, 'cause we're twinsies.
translation.zh: ‎当然他信我了 我们多像啊

translation.en: What are you even doing here?
Well, good news.
I decided to join you on this excursion to find our siblings. [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎我打算跟你一起去找我们的兄弟

translation.en: Oh! Uh...
Well, I wasn't really expectin' any company. Sorry.
translation.zh:
‎我没打算找个伴儿 ‎-对不起
‎-艾伦

translation.en: [Russell] Alan, my mother just died.
This trip may be the only thing to help me recover
from the greatest tragedy of my young life.
translation.zh:
‎也许只有这次旅程
‎能让我重振旗鼓了

translation.en: [cries] Please?
I brought cereal.
Fine.
Let's do it.
Really?
Tomorrow, we head out on a road trip.
Okay-dokay.
Give us some time to really, you know, bro down.
“Bro down”?
Did you just try to turn a noun into a verb?
Yeah, I... I guess.
That's grammatically incorrect.
Goodnight, Alan. Wanna cuddle?
[screams] Hey, man, you're naked! The hell?
Of course. I sleep in the nude.
I'm very comfortable with my body.
The buck is beautiful.
Besides, it really helps with night sweats. [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎另外 裸睡对盗汗有好处

translation.en: You don't want me to have night sweats.
I'll have this mattress floatin' around like an old raft after a hurricane.
translation.zh: ‎床垫会变得像风暴之后的旧木筏 ‎飘在水面 通常还载着一条狗

translation.en: Usually there's a dog on top.
translation.zh: ‎飘在水面 通常还载着一条狗

translation.en: It's all wet and dirty.
Boy, if you don't put some damn clothes on...
Fine. Obviously, somebody's insecure about their manhood.
translation.zh: ‎行 ‎显然有人对自己的阳具不自信啊

translation.en: You're lucky I brought my PJs, Alan. [scoffs]
Oh, wow!
Russell, did you know Alabama has nearly 600 miles of coastline?
translation.zh:
‎罗素 你知道吗？阿拉巴马州有
‎将近九百公里的海岸线

translation.en: I bet you Dawn has a big house on the beach.
translation.zh: ‎我猜道恩在海边有一座大房子

translation.en: This may not be obvious, Alan, but...
this is my first sleepover.
No!
Seriously.
Come on. I guess we could share the bed, now that you got some drawers on.
translation.zh:
‎既然你现在穿着内衣
‎那就能上我的床了 来吧！

translation.en: Yeah, I got my Underoos. Come on!
translation.zh: ‎是的 我穿了内裤 来吧！

translation.en: -Let's go, Alan! -Hey! Hey, what are you doing?
We never got to do this as kids. Come on!
translation.zh: ‎我们小时候没能这么玩过 来吧！

translation.en: Fine, but just for a little while.
Then we gotta go to bed.
Come on! I betcha I jump higher than you! I bet I can jump higher than you, Alan!
translation.zh: ‎来吧！我一定能跳得更高！艾伦

translation.en: -Look at this. I'm runnin' in the air. Mm. -Hey!
This is kind of fun!
-I told-- -Oh!
[chuckles] Thank God, Mom's dead. We surely would've got a spanking for that one.
translation.zh:
‎幸亏妈妈死了
‎否则我们就得被打屁股了

translation.en: -Now, I know your big behind-- -[grunts]
Pillow fight!
-Oh! Oh, you want a pillow fight? Okay! -[grunts]
-[grunts] -All right! Yeah!
-Okay. -That was a low blow!  -You want a pillow fight? -[mocking laugh]
[grunts] Okay, that was good.
Oh! You got some power on you, -huh, big boy? -[chuckles]
-[grunts] Take that! -[grunts]
-You're a nice, big target. -Show me what you got!
translation.zh: ‎不赖嘛 胖家伙 看你有什么能耐？

translation.en: Now, that's how you pillow fight!
Now, that wasn't really nice of you, Alan.
You know, maybe we shouldn't pillow fight. It's still dangerous. It's fightin'!
translation.zh:
‎也许我们不该枕头大战 罗素
‎太危险了 毕竟是战斗！

translation.en: You know what? Sleepovers are a lot of fun. [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎你知道吗？ ‎在外过夜真有意思

translation.en: I can't wait to see what happens tomorrow night.
Yeah. Tomorrow.
-[Alan] So long, Branford. -[Russell] Arrivederci, Branford.
translation.zh: ‎再见 布兰福德 ‎拜拜 布兰福德

translation.en: [sniffs] And they thought I'd never leave.
Proved them wrong. [chuckles]
-Who? -Oh, the naysayers.
-Oh. -My teachers, my doctor,
the butcher, the baker,
the sixth grade crossing guard,
the sheriff, the deputy,
Mom's OB-GYN.
-Oh, goddamn. -[Russell] That's pretty much everybody.
So...
-[munching] -Tell me something about yourself.
For what possible purpose?
What are you, the IRS? [laughs]
How about this?
What's your earliest memory of Mom?
translation.zh: ‎说说你最早关于妈妈的记忆

translation.en: She forced me to eat an avocado, the hussy.
translation.zh: ‎她逼我吃牛油果 这个母夜叉

translation.en: -Okay. -It was disgusting, as you might imagine.
-[laughs] -Tastes like soft-boiled Silly Putty.
That's something we have in common. I hate avocados, too.
translation.zh:
‎我们的另个共通点
‎我也不爱吃牛油果

translation.en: Great.
You like TV shows? How about we sing our favorite TV show theme song?
translation.zh:
‎你喜欢看电视？
‎我们唱最爱的电视剧主题曲吧

translation.en: Ooh, how about we don't?
♪ Now the world don't move To the beat of just one drum ♪
♪ What might be right for you ♪
♪ May not be right for some ♪
♪ A man is born ♪ ♪ He's a man of means ♪
translation.zh: ‎一个人诞生了 含着金勺长大

translation.en: ♪ Then along comes two ♪
♪ They got nothing but jeans ♪ ♪ They got ♪
♪ Diff'rent Strokes ♪ ♪ It takes ♪
♪ Diff'rent Strokes ♪ ♪ It takes ♪
♪ Diff'rent Strokes to move the world ♪
I was a big fan of Diff'rent Strokes.
Oh, I got one, I got one.
What? Come on, that's the M*A*S*H* theme song!
Makes me sleepy.
Al right. I just thought it'd be good to play some theme songs.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 我以为唱唱电视主题曲会不错

translation.en: Yeah, I got some good commercial jingles--
Russell.
-Russell! Hey. -Hmm?
I need you to drive. I'm gettin' tired.
Yeah, I don't think so.
-What? Why not? -[Russell] 'Cause...
I have no interest in assuming legal responsibility for someone else's vehicle.
translation.zh: ‎我不愿意为别人的车辆承担法律责任

translation.en: Seriously?
Also, I don't know how to drive.
[laughing] You don't know how to drive? Get outta here!
Truth be told, I've always wanted to learn,
translation.zh: ‎说实话 我一直想学开车

translation.en: so I could one day speed stylish down the road,
translation.zh: ‎说实话 我一直想学开车 ‎这样有一天 我可以开着

translation.en: in a gold '76 Pontiac Firebird Esprit.
The same vehicle owned by James Scott--
translation.zh: ‎那可是詹姆斯·斯科特的同款

translation.en: Rockford!
In The Rockford Files! Man, that was my show!
Oh, I love The Rockford Files!
-Yo, that car was sick. -[Russell] The best.
You know, I own a copy of the original operator's manual for the car.
translation.zh: ‎我还有那种车的原版说明书

translation.en: -[Alan] Really? -[chuckles]
I've read it a dozen times or something.
All right.
Well, Russell...
I'mma pull over right here, 'cause, uh... I'm tired.
translation.zh: ‎我准备停在这儿 因为我累了

translation.en: Gonna get some Z's.
[Russell] Hmm, strange. I don't see no hotel around here, Alan.
translation.zh: ‎奇怪 我没看到有旅店 艾伦

translation.en: [Alan] Because there isn't one, Russell.
-[owl hoots] Tomorrow...
I'm gonna give you your first driving lesson. How's that, huh?
translation.zh: ‎我给你上第一堂驾驶课 怎么样？

translation.en: You positive this is safe?
Yeah, it's safe.
Listen, we're family. You got my back and I got yours, right?
translation.zh:
‎听着 我们是一家人
‎我们俩互相照顾 不是吗？

translation.en: I don't know, Alan.
[scoffs] You're not exactly the family I wanted.
Yeah, well, I'm all the family you got.
You sound like the ending of a cheesy sitcom.
translation.zh: ‎听起来像俗气的情景喜剧结局

translation.en: Oh, my God. Do you ever stop talking?
translation.zh: ‎天呐 你有闭嘴的时候吗？

translation.en: -Sometimes. -Go to bed.
-Um, if I had some warm milk or something. -Start countin' cereal boxes.
translation.zh: ‎要是能喝些热牛奶 我就… ‎你数麦片盒

translation.en: That's a good idea.
-[Alan exhales] -One Lucky Charm.
-[owl hoots] -Mmm. Two Cap'n Crunch...
Three Froot Loops.
Hey, Russell, what time is it?
Russell?
Russell!
Russell!
What are you doing?
Why are you runnin' like Rerun from What's Happening?
translation.zh:
‎为什么那么拼命跑？
‎像《咋的啦？》里的重修

translation.en: -We should go now. -[Alan] Where are we goin'?
What are you runnin' from?
I think I'm ready for that driver's lesson now.
Oh, no!
My brand new Stan Smiths!
You should get in the car.
You said what?
Sounds like...
What? This is some bull...
...shit.
How now, brown cow! Whoa!
translation.zh: ‎一头牛 两个犄角一个头！

translation.en: Open the door! Open the door!
-Russell! Open the door! -[bellows]
Pop the handle! Pop the handle!
I am bewildered by this vehicle's technology.
[Alan] Open the door, Russell!
-Oh! -[grunts]
Toro!
-Stop it! -[honks horn]
Stop it!
You need to chill out.
Bro, if you don't pop the goddamn lock...
translation.zh: ‎哥们儿 如果你不把插销打开…

translation.en: I don't see a key!
I got the key! I got the key!
Ah! I think your car is possessed!
-[bellows] -[screams]
What do we do now?
Press the brake!
Okay, brake. Pedal.
Okay, now what?
Put it in drive!
Put it in drive. Okay.
-Press the gas. Lightly. -Okay. Lightly.
translation.zh: ‎踩油门 轻轻地踩 ‎好的 轻轻地踩

translation.en: What did you do to piss off a bull?
I was just trying to get some milk for my cereal and I pulled its teat!
translation.zh: ‎我只想挤点儿奶泡麦片 ‎我扯了它的奶头！

translation.en: Watch, watch!
Wow.
So, it was a good lesson. You wanna do it again?
translation.zh: ‎这个驾驶课不错 想再来一次吗？

translation.en: I think this is a different big house than the one you imagined.
translation.zh:
‎倒也是个大房子
‎但你应该没想到是监狱

translation.en: Are you certain this is the correct address?
[woman over police radio] Three-thirteen, I copy.
[Dawn] You gonna stop stealin' on me like this.
Don't put your frickin' hands--
Don't put your hands on me, Deidra. Don't put your hands on me.
You gonna stop with this light-skinned privilege.
Just 'cause you got a badge and gun don't make you no better than me.
translation.zh:
‎就因为你有警徽和枪
‎不代表你比我强多少

translation.en: Ooh, that's your mama? You better put some money on my books.
translation.zh:
‎哦 那是你娘？
‎你最好给我打点钱

translation.en: I'mma whoop your daughter's ass.
-[woman] Dawn. -Call that black bitch!
You gon' get your ass kicked.
Dawn, let these people enjoy their family.
translation.zh: ‎道恩 别招惹别人的家庭会面

translation.en: So, anyway...
This better be good, 'cause you cuttin' into my yard time.
translation.zh:
‎占用了我的放风时间
‎你最好有什么好事儿

translation.en: The guard over there say you my brother. Is that for real, for real?
translation.zh: ‎看守说你是我的兄弟 当真？

translation.en: Well, yeah. I mean... I got the birth certificate to prove it.
translation.zh: ‎没错 我有出生证明作证

translation.en: I'm Alan.
[scoffs] No. I don't know you.
Okay. Nice... Nice to meet you. [stammers] That's your other brother, Russell.
translation.zh:
‎没关系 很高兴见到你
‎他是你的另个兄弟 罗素

translation.en: -Hi. -Oh, hell to the no.
He must've came from the defected testicles. That's not my brother.
translation.zh:
‎生他的卵蛋一定有缺陷
‎这不是我的兄弟

translation.en: Now, you and I,
we do look alike. Like, I see the resemblance.
translation.zh: ‎我们确实很像 很多相似之处

translation.en: Like, this is uncanny.
I... I don't... I don't see the resemblance at all.
This is like lookin' in the mirror.
But more like a funhouse mirror,
'cause, you know, I'm voluptuous and beautiful...
[inhales] and you scrawny.
But you buff.
So, you like a crackhead
that put down the crack pipe and picked up a weight.
translation.zh: ‎放下了烟枪 练起了哑铃

translation.en: Oh, okay.
Come to Daddy.
Oh, come on.
Where're my smokes?
-I didn't... I didn't bring any smo-- -Oh, hell, no!
I know you did not
show up to a prison without no damn smokes!
Oh, that's like goin' to the Boom Boom Room
and not bringin' singles!
Ain't nobody gonna rub on your little cling-clong for free.
My dude.
[Alan] Russell!
The guards did a full pat-down. How the hell you get that in here?
translation.zh:
‎看守搜过身
‎你怎么顺进来的？

translation.en: Well, in the World War II prison comedy Hogan's Heroes,
translation.zh: ‎在二战监狱喜剧《霍根英雄》中

translation.en: Colonel Hogan once duped
the buffoonish Sergeant Schultz
by hiding a monkey wrench way deep in his anus--
Y-You know what?
-Way up there by undigested food. -[groans]
I-I get the point Thank you.
Be quiet! Damn!
Ooh, you lucky you didn't grow up with me.
-I swear I would have beat your ass. -[blows raspberry]
You smell that? That's a high wipe. He stink.
translation.zh: ‎你闻到了吗？他都馊了 臭死了！

translation.en: So, uh... Dawn.
Boom Boom Room? So... so, you're a stripper?
What the hell?
-[gasps] -A stripper and exotic dancer are different.
translation.zh: ‎跳脱衣舞的和调情舞者是两个概念

translation.en: -So get your life right, boo. -My bad.
translation.zh:
‎你得搞清楚 亲 ‎-我错了
‎-一个调情舞者

translation.en: An exotic dancer incorporate years of hard dance trainin'
translation.zh:
‎-我错了
‎-一个调情舞者 ‎需要把多年的舞蹈训练

translation.en: into her whole routine.
-Yeah. -She take all her years
of what she learned on the horizontal pole,
translation.zh: ‎在水平钢管上学到的舞蹈技术

translation.en: and she just bring it to the vertical pole
and add a little bit of this to it, and add a little bit of this.
translation.zh: ‎加点这些动作 ‎再加点这些动作

translation.en: -Please, don't... don't do that. -You see this? Here, here, here.
Plié, relevé, ass on face. Plié, relevé, ass on face.
[Alan and Dawn] Plié, relevé, ass on face.
Sashay! Sashay! Ass on face.
-Oh! -[Dawn] See?
That's how it get down.
So, you go get your education right, boo-boo.
Uh, okay.
Uh... here's some good news.
You're gonna be an auntie.
Yes! My wife is pregnant, and she's gonna be giving birth
translation.zh: ‎是的！我老婆怀孕了 ‎再过几周就要生了

translation.en: -in a couple weeks. -Are you serious?
That just warms my heart.
[sniffles] Is it yours?
-What? Yeah. Yeah, it's mine! -[Dawn] Hmm.
Sound a little suspect to me.
These hoes be out here.
Okurr?
You know, this just make me think about my babies, you know.
Oh, really? You-- You have children?
Mm-hmm.
And I think about them. There ain't nothin' I wouldn't do for my kids.
translation.zh: ‎是的 我常想他们 ‎为了他们 我什么都敢做

translation.en: I would commit murder!
Violent murder! I'd shiv somebody so hard!
-So sweet of you. -Murder!
You know, nothin' says "I love you" like a...
little old-fashioned murder, right?
And you know what? You family.
So I would do the same for you.
[stutters] And I feel the same way about you.
Minus the murder.
You know, there is somethin' that maybe you can...
-You know what? No. -Dawn, stop.
translation.zh: ‎还是算了吧 ‎道恩 别客气！

translation.en: You sure?
I just need a little help with, like, a little bit of bail money.
translation.zh:
‎只需要帮我一个小忙
‎付一小笔保释费

translation.en: Oh. Well, how...
[stammering] How much help do you need?
Just crumbs. Come here.
[whispers] Ten thousand dollars.
Oh, goddamn!
Oh, you gonna help me? Oh, my goodness!
-You so sweet! -Contraband!
-Contraband? He got contraband! -What? No, wait! I ain't got--
translation.zh: ‎违禁品？他带了违禁品！ ‎什么？我没有…等一下！

translation.en: Hold up!
[Dawn] He's got contraband!
Hold up, hold up.

translation.en: -Same legs. -Uh, okay.
-All right. -I see it.
Let's... let's not talk about the looks. Let's talk about what's important.
translation.zh:
‎先别说长相了
‎回到当务之急

translation.en: And that is... how do you feel, huh?
Oh, not bad for a guy on his deathbed.
translation.zh: ‎作为垂死之人 感觉还不错

translation.en: -That... That ain't funny. -Completely inappropriate, Alan.
translation.zh: ‎一点都不好笑 ‎太过分了 艾伦

translation.en: Just 'cause he look like a little voodoo doll
don't mean you get to make fun of him.
Oh, um... sorry.
But you do give me the heebie-jeebies.
'Cause my skin been crawlin' since I been here.
translation.zh: ‎一进门 我鸡皮疙瘩就起来了

translation.en: Like a little dehydrated Smurf.
You know, they're threatenin' to amputate my right arm.
Thank God I can throw with both.
[all] Me too!
-No way! -That's so...
-Yeah? -Really?
-Wow, this-- -This is crazy!
-Our genetics is strong. -Oh, my God!
You know, I just want to thank you for comin',
from the bottom of my enlarged heart.
I just knew one day,
a miracle's gonna walk right through that door.
I just wanna thank God.
God is good. Makes me wanna scream His name and say,
translation.zh: ‎伟大的上帝 我想呼喊他的名字

translation.en: ♪ Holy do it! ♪
I pray to him,
and he makes my cereal cupeth runneth overeth.
Dr. Williams! Hey.
-Hey! How you doin', Doc? -Alan! Wow.
-Nice to meet you. -Wow, what a wonderful thing
you're doin' for Baby Pete, Alan.
You are a hero.
Ah, it's no big deal, you know?
I mean, it's a bit of a drive, but--
Still. Not every day that a long-lost family member appears out of thin air
translation.zh: ‎但很少会有失散的家人 ‎从天而降愿意捐肾

translation.en: to donate a kidney.
You said what?
[stammers] Now, Alan, it's just a simple procedure.
translation.zh: ‎艾伦 这只是个简单的手术

translation.en: You'll be out of here in a few days.
A few days?
As long as there are no complications. But hey, you get the honor
translation.zh: ‎前提是没有并发症 ‎但你有机会救你兄弟的命

translation.en: of saving your brother's life.
Right? I just need you to sign this release.
Doc, I don't care about him.
translation.zh: ‎医生 我管不了他 我不认识他

translation.en: -I don't know him. -Sure you do.
-You lyin', Alan. -[doctor] You're so funny.
translation.zh:
‎-你在撒谎 艾伦
‎-你真有趣！

translation.en: I don't know this little--
Why does it gotta be me?
Why you gotta take my kidney? Why don't you take one of theirs?
translation.zh:
‎为什么要拿我的肾？
‎怎么不问他们要？

translation.en: Well, apparently, I'm "medically obese," so, it counts me out.
translation.zh: ‎显然我过度肥胖 不够格

translation.en: And don't look at me, 'cause I sniffed way too much laptop cleaner,
translation.zh: ‎别看着我 我吸了太多毒

translation.en: and I popped a Molly yesterday.
I want some Molly.
What's Molly?
Okay. [sighs]
Alan, I get it. You're scared.
translation.zh: ‎艾伦 我明白 你害怕

translation.en: I was scared when I had my first colonic.
translation.zh:
‎我第一次做结肠检查时
‎也很害怕

translation.en: He put a finger in my butt,
-I felt-- But-- -No, no... That's not--
Okay.
-Baby Pete? -Mm-hmm.
I wanna help you.
-Okay. -You're my brother.
For another three days to a week.
When he die, I'm just gonna take his little dead body
translation.zh: ‎他死后 我要把他的一片遗骨

translation.en: and put it on a key chain, like a rabbit's foot.
translation.zh: ‎挂在钥匙串上 像一只兔脚

translation.en: Look, guys. I'm about to become a dad.
translation.zh: ‎听着 我马上要当父亲了

translation.en: And if something happens to me,
then my child will grow up without a father.
And that already happened to me.
And you.
So, no. I'm sorry. I-I can't do it.
You, sir, are a monster!
That is not fair.
He's too young to die.
Take part of me, instead.
Just not my kidneys.
-Say what? -Move, Dawn.
Oh, you ain't about nothin'.
I can't believe I fought those two rednecks for you.
translation.zh:
‎难以置信
‎我还替你出头暴揍了那俩乡巴佬

translation.en: You started that fight!
Ugh, you make me sick.
Uh, look, Alan.
I'm high on the donor's list.
The doctor's say I have a 0.001 chance.
Yeah, [stammers] that's a chance.
-Mr. Daniels. -Hey.
An OR just became available.
We are ready to take care of that nose.
-Okay. Be careful. -All right.
-Looks like it's setting sideways. -Ow!
translation.zh:
‎-好 小心点
‎-行 好像 ‎有点偏了

translation.en: Just need you to sign these release forms.
Here you go, Doc.
Aw, thanks, Baby Pete.
Ah, no problem, bro.
translation.zh:
‎-没问题 兄弟
‎-你真是个好人

translation.en: Baby Pete, I'm... I'm sorry.
Don't worry about it, Alan.
Everything happens for a reason.
Be strong, okay?
Bye.
You'll always be with me.
And let go of all that negative energy.
translation.zh: ‎（欢迎准妈妈来喂养课） ‎排出所有负能量

translation.en: Let go, and create a cocoon of positivity,
-for your beautiful baby. -All right, move on.
translation.zh:
‎-为了你的漂亮宝宝…
‎-好了 翻篇

translation.en: The sun, the moon, and the stars. Let's get to the titties, you know?
translation.zh:
‎别再说太阳、星星、月亮了
‎我们直接说咪咪吧

translation.en: Let's-- That's what we're here for, right?
-Let's... Let's pull them suckers out. -[clears throat]
-Alan. -Did I say that out loud?
-Yes. -My bad.
Sorry.
Now... before you expose the nipple,
translation.zh: ‎好了 在你露出乳头之前

translation.en: we want to be careful.
-Hey! Hey! Excuse me! -Huh?
Absolutely no photos!
-Jesus, stop it! -I just want one picture for the 'Gram.
translation.zh:
‎-天呐 别照了！
‎-我只拍一张 ‎-发给奶奶
‎-不行！

translation.en: [instructor] No! Do I have to ask you to leave?
-[Marie] What's gotten into you? -I ain't been feelin' well all day.
translation.zh: ‎你怎么回事？ ‎我一整天都感觉不太好

translation.en: -[sniffs] Do you-- Is that Hennessy? -That's cognac, but it ain't Hennessy.
translation.zh: ‎你喝了…轩尼诗？ ‎干邑白兰地 但不是轩尼诗

translation.en: Now, latching is everything.
I just wanna volunteer if anybody needs help with latching.
translation.zh: ‎谁想要练习含乳 我自告奋勇

translation.en: -That's it, sir. You have to leave. -[people murmuring]
translation.zh: ‎够了 先生 请你离开

translation.en: Man, y'all a bunch of prudes in this class.
-Hold on-- Girl, this is Coogi! The Coo-- -[Marie] Mm-mm.
translation.zh: ‎等一下…别把我的酷奇扯坏了

translation.en: Who the hell are you?
Baby, why you trippin'? I'm Alan.
You're Ethan.
Or Jaspar. You know what? It doesn't matter.
translation.zh:
‎或者贾斯帕尔
‎算了 不重要

translation.en: You know what? I-- I am Alan.
Says right here on my ID.
See? That's Alan.
-Oh, hell no. -That's me.
Oh, my goodness.
See, smilin'. Who you callin'? Wait, who you callin'?
I'm callin' the police.
-You can't call the po-po! -Yes, I can!
-Who are you, Barbecue Becky? -I will be.
-Are you Permit Patty? -Try me.
Okay. [stammers] Let a brother explain.
You've got five seconds.
All right. Okay, here's the thing.
I'm Ethan.
That's what I thought.
I had got an email from Alan saying he wanted to find a family,
translation.zh:
‎我收到艾伦的邮件
‎他想找家人

translation.en: and he sound real sentimental, like a little sad sack,
so he sound vulnerable to me,
so I was like, "Boom, let me get his identity."
So, I was gonna procure a small business loan
because Alan got good credit.
Like, he got white credit. See, I see why you was with him, sister.
translation.zh:
‎信誉像白人一样好
‎我懂你为什么嫁他了

translation.en: Wait, so you were gonna steal my husband's identity?
translation.zh: ‎等一下 你想盗用我丈夫的身份？

translation.en: I'mma be real with you. I know I look rich with this old gold tooth in my mouth,
translation.zh:
‎说实话 ‎哥知道自己看着很有钱
‎因为嘴里镶金牙

translation.en: that says, "Money, money, money!"
But that's not the case, okay? I...
[sighs] I'm flat broke.
Yeah, I lost my business a couple of months ago.
-As what? A thief? -[Ethan] Girl, I am legitimate.
translation.zh: ‎什么生意？盗窃？ ‎我有合法生意

translation.en: I own a nail salon.
I do acrylics, gels, silks.
[chuckles] This place be magical.
Oh, really? Then what was it called?
"This Place Be Magical."
And why should I believe you?
Look here, did I hustle in the streets my whole life?
translation.zh:
‎看看我
‎是不是在街上摸爬滚打长大？

translation.en: Yes. Ain't nobody picked me up from the State home.
translation.zh: ‎是的 因为没人把我领回家去养

translation.en: So, you were never in a foster home?
No, ma'am.
Oh, my God. I'm...
-I'm so sorry-- -I'm good. I'm not... Stop that.
translation.zh:
‎-我很抱歉…
‎-没事 我没关系…行了

translation.en: I'm good. You know? I'm happy I did, you know?
translation.zh: ‎没事 我对自己的过去很满意

translation.en: -Okay. -'Cause it... it made me who I am.
And I gotta tell ya, nail art?
Bam! [chuckles] It was poppin'!
Until the landlord wanna break my lease without warnin'.
translation.zh: ‎后来房东突然终止了我的租约

translation.en: Oh, well that's not legal. Any decent lawyer could tell you that.
translation.zh:
‎这可不合法
‎随便一个正规律师都知道

translation.en: Girl, I can't afford no damn lawyer. What's wrong with you?
translation.zh: ‎我可付不起律师费 说什么呢？

translation.en: What's your tenant ID?
Only one phone call.
You gonna make me blush, and I'm black, and it's gonna look weird.
translation.zh: ‎别让我脸红 黑人脸红很奇怪

translation.en: [woman] All right, Alan, you're all set.
translation.zh: ‎好了 艾伦 一切准备就绪

translation.en: Okay.
-Tell the doc to make it pretty. -[woman] Sure.
translation.zh:
‎-让医生把我整得好看点
‎-没问题

translation.en: [stammering] Uh, what's that?
It's to relax you. I don't think you're gonna wanna be awake for this.
translation.zh:
‎这会让你放松
‎你可不想清醒着做手术

translation.en: Okay, that's a good point. Oh, wow.
This that stuff Lil Wayne have in his cup.
Dr. Williams?
That's me.
I thought the other doctor was...
Didn't... Another doctor's gonna be workin' on my... fix...
translation.zh: ‎难道不是另一个医生 ‎来修我的…

translation.en: What's this thing called?
-Nose? Yes. -Yeah.
Yes, we're doing that as well.
-You got a nose. -I do.
You may wanna back off the dose a little bit.
Nurse, you got a... You got a big nose.
Okay, everything's in order. Let's get him marked up.
translation.zh:
‎好了 一切就绪
‎我们先画线

translation.en: So, we will go in through the naval, laproscopically.
translation.zh:
‎我们会在肚脐开刀
‎探进内窥镜

translation.en: Then, through the incision point, we will remove the kidney
and transplant it in Baby Pete.
[Dr. Williams] Alan! Alan!
-Ethan? -[Ethan] Mm-hmm.
Um, have you seen my necklace,
the one with the diamond pendant?
-Wow! -Oh, the one with the diamond p--
Oh, you-- you-- you talkin' about this right here?
I was just, um, holdin' it for you. I was cleanin' it, actually.
translation.zh:
‎我只是帮你收着
‎保养一下 实际上

translation.en: You-- You know, you need to invest in a safe. Uh...
A less legitimate brother might've stole this from you.
translation.zh: ‎也许某个不地道的兄弟会偷走

translation.en: But I ain't that type of dude. You know what I'm sayin'?
It's beautiful.
-Oh, oh! -[Marie] Look at this.
-Ain't no thang but a chicken wang. -[gasps]
You know, that's how I do. You know, I just like to paint. It's just somethin' I do.
translation.zh: ‎我的老本行 我喜欢画画儿

translation.en: That color right there, that's a tough one. That's...
That's Nose Candy White.
And all the hoochies love that one, you know?
Behind Black Bitch, Big Booty Brown, and Ratchet Raspberry.
translation.zh: ‎仅次于母狗黑、肥臀褐和怨妇红

translation.en: But I... I thought it was a little inappropriate
to paint the baby's room Black Bitch.
I mean, unless of course, it's a girl. Then, you know... it may work.
translation.zh: ‎除非是个女孩 那样也许能行

translation.en: [crying] Thank you.
And I-I just wanna take this time to thank you for what you've done,
'cause, you know, throughout my life, ain't nobody really ever
done me or treated me like-- Shit!
-[grunts] -Oh, Ethan.
What I... What I'm tryin' to say...
Not many people really give a fuck...
One second. [inhales deeply]
What I'm tryin' to say is that, you know, I had a hard...
translation.zh: ‎我是想说 我经历过很多…

translation.en: -[Marie] It's okay. -Hard life...
You're a good woman, you know?
You're kind, you got most of your hair.
-Thank you. -Hey, look, Alan's a lucky man.
translation.zh:
‎-谢谢
‎-听着 ‎艾伦是个幸运的男人

translation.en: -Oh! -Oh, yeah. Oh, yeah! He's--
-Ooh. -Look, 'cause I had some devious plans.
-I'm just keepin' it real. -Uh-huh.
-You know? What happened? Is... -[Marie chuckles]
-It's kicking. -[Ethan] It's kicking?
Oh, you want me to kick it back?
-Oh, no, no, no. It's okay. -Okay.
Oh, you got your little-- Girl, I just-- I could teach him some stuff.
translation.zh:
‎你怀了一个小… 我可以
‎我可以教他很多事情

translation.en: -I know Wu-Tang and-- -Really?
Yeah, and Wong Chang and Chang Wong.
-Yeah, Ethan knows it. -I can teach your baby to kick.
translation.zh:
‎-我能教你孩子腿法
‎-伊森懂的

translation.en: We could teach him to slap.
Ain't nobody was better at slap boxin'. I'd slap the shit out them white boys.
translation.zh:
‎天下无敌的掌法 ‎我的掌法能把白人小子
‎打得屁滚尿流

translation.en: [man over PA] Blue team to ICU, please. Blue team, ICU.
translation.zh: ‎重症监护病房出现紧急情况

translation.en: Where am I?
Take it easy, Alan.
You've been out of surgery for several hours.
One less kidney, but your nose is back to normal.
translation.zh: ‎少了一个肾脏 但鼻子修复好了

translation.en: One less...
-[screaming] -Okay, calm down.
-It's fine. Deep breaths. -Where is he?
translation.zh:
‎-没关系的 深呼吸
‎-他在哪儿？

translation.en: -No, no. -Where is he?
-I'm going to kill this little-- Oh! -Sir, please, no!
translation.zh:
‎-我要杀了这个小…
‎-先生 请不要动

translation.en: -You need to take it easy! -Take it easy?!
The boy took my kidney! I need my kidney.
translation.zh:
‎那家伙偷了我的肾！
‎我需要我的肾

translation.en: I don't know what for, but I need it! Can you put it back?
translation.zh:
‎我不知道要来干嘛 但缺不得
‎你还能放回去吗？

translation.en: No. That's ridiculous.
-Stay in bed. -[groans]
Okay, where is he? Where's Baby Pete?
translation.zh: ‎好 他在哪儿？婴儿皮特在哪儿？

translation.en: On a flight to Havana.
He took my kidney to a communist country?
translation.zh:
‎他带着我的肾
‎飞去了共产主义国家？

translation.en: He took a Medi-Jet this afternoon.
translation.zh: ‎他乘坐今天下午的急诊飞机

translation.en: He started a crowdfunding page for his post-op.
Raised $200,000. People really love that guy.
translation.zh: ‎拿到了二十万 人们很喜欢他

translation.en: I hate that guy! I'm gonna kill him.
-Where's my keys? Where are my keys? -Oh!
translation.zh:
‎-我的车钥匙呢？我的车钥匙呢？
‎-哦！

translation.en: Well, your sister left you this.
and one car.
You my boo thang four life. Dawn."
translation.zh: ‎你是我的一身最爱 道恩留”

translation.en: You don't spell "for" F-O-U-R, you ignoramus!
Didn't they teach you English in jail?!
All right. You stay there, and I'm gonna get the doctor.
translation.zh: ‎你待在这儿 我去找医生

translation.en: [Alan] Okay.
I'm gonna kill these people! All of 'em.
You gave him your kidney?
Well, I didn't give it to him. He stole it.
Well, [stammering] are you okay?
[Alan] No, I'm not okay.
Only good thing is they fixed my broken nose.
translation.zh: ‎唯一的好事是他们修好了鼻子

translation.en: Broken nose? What-- What the hell is goin' on over there?
translation.zh:
‎你的鼻子怎么了？
‎到底发生了什么？

translation.en: I don't know. I had all these dreams, Marie,
about us bein' a family and I finally have somethin' to bring to the table.
translation.zh: ‎我一直梦想着家人团聚 ‎为孩子带来传承

translation.en: But you know what I learned about family?
translation.zh: ‎但你知道家人教会了我什么吗？

translation.en: They take. They take your money, they take your car... [groans]
translation.zh:
‎他们会掠夺
‎夺走你的钱 夺走你的车

translation.en: they take your kidney.
Look. I don't know exactly what's going on over there,
but you need to get your shit together!
-But baby, it's not me! You don't unders-- -No, no, no! I wanted you
translation.zh:
‎-不 宝贝 问题不在于我！你不明白…
‎-不 ！

translation.en: to find your family, to help you fill that void.
translation.zh:
‎我希望你能找到家人
‎让你的身世完整

translation.en: And up till this very moment,
-I have been supportive of you. -[Alan] Yes, but...
translation.zh:
‎-我都非常支持
‎-是的 但是…

translation.en: M-Marie, you don't understand.
translation.zh:
‎玛丽 你不明白 问题不在于我
‎而在于那帮人

translation.en: It's not me, it's these people, this-- this family!
translation.zh:
‎玛丽 你不明白 问题不在于我
‎而在于那帮人 ‎这些所谓的家人！他们毁了一切

translation.en: They screw everything up.
translation.zh: ‎这些所谓的家人！他们毁了一切

translation.en: [Marie] No, Alan, it is you who is screwing everything up
translation.zh: ‎不 艾伦 你毁了一切

translation.en: with the family you have right here!
I'm having your baby.
And you need to bring your ass home, or don't bother coming home at all!
translation.zh:
‎你最好给我死回来
‎否则你就永远别回来！

translation.en: That might be the hormones talking, I'm not really sure.
translation.zh:
‎也许只是荷尔蒙坏脾气在发作
‎我不确定

translation.en: -Marie, baby, you don-- -Just bring your ass home!
translation.zh:
‎-玛丽 宝贝 你不用…
‎-你给我死回来！

translation.en: Excuse me.
Yo!
Uber!
Are you for Alan?
Uh, no, Elaine.
-Damn it. -[Russell] Hey, Alan!
Where do you think you're goin'?
The doctor was pretty insistent that you stay here for at least a week.
You know, Alan, I've been thinking.
That was a pretty incredible thing you did for Baby Pete.
translation.zh:
‎你为婴儿皮特做的事
‎太伟大了

translation.en: Who gives their kidney to somebody he just met?
translation.zh: ‎谁会捐肾给一个刚认识的人？

translation.en: Yeah, but then again, I did you give you my second-to-last hard candy, so...
translation.zh:
‎但我也分给了你一颗糖
‎哪怕我只剩下两颗

translation.en: I guess we both sacrificed, huh? Heroes.
translation.zh: ‎所以我们俩都牺牲自我 是个英雄

translation.en: I'm goin' home.
[Russell] Seriously?
I really woulda wish I had known that was the case.
I just said goodbye to Dawn.
Yeah, but I'm pretty sure she would've taken us back, though.
"Us"?
Did you just say "us"?
Yeah, Alan. I'm not gonna abandon you after you had a major surgery.
translation.zh: ‎是的 艾伦 ‎你刚做过大手术 我不会抛弃你

translation.en: Russell... there is no "us".
This trip is over.
I'm goin' home.
Alone.
Wait, so you're just gonna leave without me?
translation.zh: ‎等一下 你打算不带我 ‎一个人走？

translation.en: We're brothers!
You're gonna make me say it, huh?
Don't hit me.
I never wanna see you again!
I don't wanna be in a car with you,
or any enclosed space, with you or that supposed family,
translation.zh:
‎不想跟你或者其他所谓的家人
‎同处一室

translation.en: for the rest of my... now-shortened life.
Let's just go back to pretending that neither of us even exist.
Is that clear enough for you, Russell?
[man] Alan.
-Finally. -[screams]
I don't know him! I'll use my warning whistle!
Hey. This is my house.
Who the hell would bring us here?
[man] I understand...
you're looking for me.
-What the hell are you doin'? -I'm playing dead.
This way, he sees you're alive, he'll kill you first,
translation.zh:
‎这样他就知道你还活着 ‎他会先杀你
‎为我赢得时间 想逃跑的办法

translation.en: buy me time to plot my escape.
translation.zh:
‎他会先杀你
‎为我赢得时间 想逃跑的办法

translation.en: [man] And now...
you will regret...
that you have...
found...
me.
Jaspar?
In the flesh.
Revive him.
[pants] Oh! That made my nipples dance.
[shudders] I thought I was a goner.
Thank you, kind sir, for saving my life.
-I'm forever indebted-- -Enough of the buffoonery!
translation.zh: ‎我将终生铭记… ‎收起你的小丑表演！

translation.en: Y-You know, despite the obvious...
we look exactly alike.
You and I? Hardly.
Us? Negative.
You two, however...
[chuckles] It's uncanny.
Twinsies.
I find it ironic that I...
am the black sheep of the family.
-Laugh! -[laughs]
I didn't... I didn't get it.
'Cause he's really light-skinned and yellow,
like jaundiced chicken or something.
Oh. That's not funny.
You know, growing up, I...
I never quite fit in.
Oh, Lord. Here we go.
A black kid, light skin, red hair.
translation.zh: ‎黑人小孩 浅色皮肤 红色头发

translation.en: I was called all kind of terrible, derogatory names.
"Strawberry Shortcake."
"The Butterscotch Kid."
"Little Orphan Annie."
I have to admit...
it was a hard-knock life.
They called me "ninger."
You know what a "ninger" is?
It's an "n"-word and a ginger, mixed.
It's good, it's good.
You throw two derogatory terms together and you make me a "ninger"?
translation.zh:
‎竟敢混合两个骂人的词
‎用来侮辱我？

translation.en: But despite the odds, I found my place...
translation.zh: ‎排除万难 我还是在世上

translation.en: in the world.
You see, gentlemen,
I collect sensitive information for high net-worth individuals,
and the government,
and I've run the occasional offshore black site,
but that was just really for my entertainment.
[stammers] So, you're a spy?
Officially, I don't exist.
Cool!
Yet, your wife...
called The Pentagon about me, seven times.
translation.zh:
‎为了找我
‎给五角大楼打了七次电话

translation.en: She's just persistent.
And that raises red flags, Alan.
I don't like red flags.
Gonna have to agree with Jaspar on that one.
Red flags are not good.
Would you shut the fuck up?
You shut up. [inhales deeply]
Why are you...
trying...
[yelling] to find me?
I-I just wanted to meet my family, so I tracked down our birth mother,
translation.zh:
‎我想找回家人
‎所以查到了我们的生母

translation.en: but she was dead.
-That's the truth! -Lies!
He has a really juicy mouth, right?
-I gotta teach you the hard way. -[stammers] What's that? What's that box?
translation.zh: ‎我得让你吃点苦头 ‎这是什么？什么盒子？

translation.en: -[Jaspar] Liar, liar... -[stammers] I'm not lying! I swear.
translation.zh: ‎骗子的屁股… ‎我没有撒谎！我发誓

translation.en: -What's that? What's that? -...pants on fire.
You gonna attach that to my balls? Wait, wait, wait!
translation.zh: ‎你打算把这夹在我鸡鸡上？ ‎等一下 听着 我没有撒谎

translation.en: Okay, listen. I'm not lyin'.
translation.zh: ‎等一下 听着 我没有撒谎

translation.en: I'm having a baby!
You won't have no baby no more.
And Russell, well,
-he got so much TV left to watch. -I do.
translation.zh:
‎-他还有很多电视等着他看
‎-没错

translation.en: I don't think he's seen anything after 1984.
translation.zh:
‎我觉得1984年之后的节目
‎他都没看过

translation.en: Television. Huh.
So, uh, what's your favorite show?
The Rockford Files.
Oh!
Rockford Files.
-Mm-hmm. -[Jaspar] Here's a fun fact.
I am the largest collector of Rockford memorabilia
translation.zh:
‎我是《洛克福德档案》周边
‎最大的收藏家 ‎西半球这边

translation.en: this side of the Western Hemisphere!
Impressive.
[Jaspar] In fact...
I own the original picture car.
translation.zh: ‎我拥有参加电影拍摄的原版车

translation.en: Braggart.
Y-You know, Russell owns the only existing copy
of the operating manual for that car.
Don't you, Russell?
Does he?
Some stupid rich guy keeps trying to get it from me,
translation.zh: ‎有个有钱的傻瓜一直想跟我买

translation.en: and I tell him, "No, idiot."
You're the one.
-Oh, it's you. -Uh-oh.
I've been lookin' for that.
-I'm gonna fry your fat balls! -I-I-I... Wait. Hold on.
translation.zh:
‎-我要烤焦...
‎-我… ‎-你的肥蛋蛋
‎-不 等一下

translation.en: Listen, I can vocalize the theme song to Rockford Files with near perfect pitch.
translation.zh:
‎我能用几乎完美的音调
‎唱出《洛克福德档案》的主题曲

translation.en: Who cares?
Take it away, Alan!
Take it away, Jack!
Let 'em go! Untie 'em!
-Thank you. -[Jaspar scatting]
And to think, I was gonna kill ya.
But you still haven't told me the truth!
-[screams] -Wh-whoa!
What are you doin'? This is crazy!
"Crazy" is being raised
in a State home
by government psychiatrists that lie about who you are!
translation.zh:
‎被精神科医生养大
‎还隐瞒你的身世！

translation.en: Okay, that's crazy.
Never feeling the embrace of your mother.
Not one frickin' hug, Alan.
[sobs] Not one.
Well, as the only one here who has received the embrace of his mother,
translation.zh: ‎作为唯一被母亲拥抱过的人

translation.en: I'll tell you, hugs are overrated
translation.zh: ‎我告诉你 拥抱没那么好

translation.en: and a breeding ground for diseases.
[whispering] Shut the hell up!
Besides, Mama smells weird.
Like moth balls and used floss string.
translation.zh: ‎樟脑丸混合用过的牙线的味道

translation.en: Now it's time... to say your goodbyes.
Jaspar, please.
Bye, Alan.
-[cocks gun] -Please, please, please.
What in the highest heavens is goin' on?
Russell, I know this ain't no party,
'cause you ain't got no damn friends.
Aw, Mother.
What're you doing home?
Mother?
Yeah, there was an E. coli outbreak on the cruise ship,
so they let us off in Ensenada.
Now, somebody need to start talkin' before I get my belt.
translation.zh:
‎你们赶快解释清楚
‎别逼我抽出皮带

translation.en: Or worse, my shotgun.
I-I thought you was dead.
That's news to me.
I'm Alan.
I'm your son.
My Lord. Alan?
Oh, my God. My baby?
Look at you. You all growed up.
So tall and handsome.
You look just like your brother. [sniffles]
I told you. Twinsies.
Same hairline and everything.
Oh, it's uncanny!
Oh, so good to see you. Come here.
-Oh! -[Alan gasping]
-Feels so good to have you in my arms! -[muffled] Mom...
-It's been so long. -[Alan gasping]
translation.zh:
‎-好久没见过你
‎-我喘不过气了

translation.en: Hey, Alan, you smell it? You smell the moth balls and the dentures?
translation.zh: ‎艾伦 闻到了吗？ ‎樟脑球混合假牙的味道

translation.en: Just breathe them bosom scents. Yes!
-[Alan grunting] -Okay, okay, that's enough, Mother.
I just got carried away.
Who stepped on a cat?
Oh, Jaspar.
Oh, my Lord. Jaspar?
[crying] Yes, Mother.
I'd recognize that face anywhere.
You do? Oh, Mother!
Oh, you got all the Irish in you, boy.
translation.zh: ‎哦 你的爱尔兰血统很明显

translation.en: One thirty-fourth.
Look at you with all them beautiful pink undertones,
with your honey-almond complexion.
Look at my lilttle redbone. Mm-mm.
[yells] Now, put that goddamn gun down,
-'fore I spank the pink out yo ass! -I'm sorry, Mother. I'm so sorry.
translation.zh:
‎-免得我抽你的红屁股
‎-我很抱歉 妈妈

translation.en: Who the hell you think you are?
I've been a bad boy.
Yes, you have.
I think I need a whooping.
You could just spank me all over my little red tushie.
-Oh, baby. -Oh, Mother.
It's not your fault, honey.
It's not your fault.
Oh, Mother. Your big man hands.
translation.zh: ‎哦 妈妈 你巨大的男人手

translation.en: Mama should've know something like this was gonna happen.
translation.zh: ‎妈妈应该知道这种事情会发生

translation.en: [shuddering breaths] You all were just babies when I...
[crying] dropped you off like an old bag of dirty clothes.
translation.zh: ‎当我把你们像旧衣服一样丢掉时

translation.en: I was young.
A single mom with six babies. No husband.
translation.zh: ‎六个孩子的单身母亲 没有丈夫

translation.en: [inhales deeply] No family.
I had no one.
It's such a stereotype.
It's okay.
[inhales deeply] 'Cause now all y'all have each other.
Thanks to you, Alan.
So, why would you tell me she was dead?
All right, Alan, listen.
When you said you were my brother, I panicked.
translation.zh:
‎当你自称是我兄弟时
‎我慌了

translation.en: I thought you was trying to take Mother from me.
translation.zh:
‎我以为你会从我身边
‎抢走妈妈

translation.en: Oh, baby.
So, why would you come along?
When I found out there was more of you... Well, "us"...
translation.zh:
‎当我知道你...
‎我还有其他兄弟时

translation.en: I had to see for myself.
And, well... since we hit the road together,
I've done things I've only seen on television.
translation.zh:
‎我得以尝试了那些
‎只在电视上看过的事情

translation.en: Alan...
these past few days...
were the greatest of my life.
[inhales deeply] And I know I'm not the family that you wanted...
translation.zh:
‎跟你理想的家人相比
‎我知道自己相差甚远

translation.en: But you're the family I got.
Wow.
This remind me of all those classic sitcom finales.
translation.zh:
‎这让我想起了
‎那些经典情景喜剧的结局

translation.en: [inhales deeply] Make you feel all warm and tingly inside.
Bros?
Bros.
[Lynette] Look at my baby.
I'm so glad y'all made up, 'cause I was about to make y'all kiss on the mouth.
translation.zh:
‎你们和好了 我真高兴
‎我本想让你们亲嘴儿

translation.en: -That's how we do. -I want a kiss on the mouth.
translation.zh: ‎我们就会这么和好 ‎我要亲嘴儿

translation.en: Well, Mom, I guess if I'm gonna have a first kiss, -why not it be Alan? -No!
translation.zh:
‎妈妈 既然如此
‎我何不把初吻献给艾伦？

translation.en: I always thought it was gonna be with Tootie from Facts of Life.
translation.zh:
‎不！ ‎我一直以为会献给
‎《生活事实》中的托蒂

translation.en: -[cell phone vibrates] -I never thought my first kiss
translation.zh:
‎我从没想过初吻会献给兄弟
‎准备好了吗？

translation.en: -would be with my brother. Ready? -Excuse me.
translation.zh:
‎我从没想过初吻会献给兄弟
‎准备好了吗？ ‎抱歉！

translation.en: Marie. You're not gonna believe this,
but I was on my way home, and I got kidnapped. Crazy, ri--
translation.zh:
‎我在回家路上被绑架了
‎很疯狂 是吧？

translation.en: -[Marie] My water broke. -Your what?
My water broke!
[stammers] You gotta get to the hospital.
I got you a long t-shirt that says, "Mom Hair, Don't Care."
translation.zh:
‎我拿了一件长T恤衫 上面写着
‎“剪超短 不在乎”

translation.en: All I need is some weed 'cause I'm a little stressed.
translation.zh: ‎我想抽点大麻 因为压力很大

translation.en: Alan, get back here! Do you hear me?
translation.zh: ‎艾伦 你快回来！听到了没有？

translation.en: I'm havin' the baby!
[yells] Get back here!
-[line disconnects] -O-Okay.
It's Marie.
She's in labor.
The baby's comin'!
-Oh, wow! -Yippee!
Lord, God is good. I'm gonna be a grandma!
translation.zh: ‎天呐 伟大的神 我要当奶奶了

translation.en: I'm gonna be an uncle! Uncle Russell.
Terrible name.
Hey, Alan.
Take my car.
Thanks... bro.
I'll stay with Mother. Maybe get that hug.
translation.zh: ‎我留下来陪妈妈 ‎得到一个拥抱

translation.en: Oh, that's so sweet of you, baby.
If you scratch it, I'll kill ya.
[laughs] I was just joshin'.
No, I'm not.
Come on, Alan. Let's ride!
Come on, Russell. Come on!
-Bye, Mom! -Bye, Mom!
And make sure you change your underwear. You know you got that high-wipe!
Oh, shit!
A gold 1976 Pontiac Firebird Esprit!
The same one driven in...
[both] The Rockford Files!
translation.zh:
‎-《洛克福德档案》
‎-《洛克福德档案》

translation.en: -Come on, Russell. Let's go. -No, Alan.
translation.zh:
‎-快 罗素 我们走吧
‎-不 艾伦

translation.en: I'll drive.
Hood slide!
I'm okay.
What are you doing?
I always wanted to do that.
You're on the wrong side.
Oh.
Buckle up.
'Cause we're about to take off!
Sorry, Miss Gallagher!
Keep it between the lines, Russell!
Yeah, well, there's only so much you could learn from a manual, Alan.
translation.zh: ‎说明书教不了我这么多 艾伦

translation.en: Go around. Go around 'em!
-[siren wails] -Uh-oh! Here comes the fuzz.
Russell, go! Go, go, go!
Don't worry, Alan. They'll never take us alive!
translation.zh:
‎别担心 艾伦
‎他们活逮不了我们！

translation.en: That's the idea! Let's go!
Well, they won't take you alive, but I'm gonna surrender. Sorry.
translation.zh:
‎他们会击毙你
‎但我会投降 抱歉！

translation.en: Hold on, Alan!
Watch out, coming through!
-[tires skid] -Watch the car!
-[Alan] Oh! -Move!
Alan, all these cars are going the wrong way!
translation.zh: ‎艾伦 怎么这些车都在逆行？

translation.en: No, you're goin' the wrong way!
My bad!
This is like Dukes of Hazzard without the racist car.
translation.zh:
‎像是《正义前锋》里的场景
‎但这车并不种族歧视

translation.en: -All right, Alan. Hospital's coming up! -Okay.
translation.zh:
‎-好了 艾伦 快到医院了！
‎-好的

translation.en: I'm gonna slow down a little, and I need you to tuck and roll.
translation.zh: ‎我会稍稍减速 你得跳车

translation.en: What? You want me to jump out of a moving car?
translation.zh: ‎什么？你让我从飞驰的车里跳下去？

translation.en: It worked for Jim Rockford every time!
I ain't Rockford!
Now, do it! Go!
It worked. [groans]
Not today, fuzz.
That was a J-turn! I did a J-turn!
Go!
Eat my dust, copper!
translation.zh: ‎在我后面吃灰吧 死条子！

translation.en: [panting] I'm looking for my wife, Marie Daniels?
-Right in there. -Thank you.
[Ethan] Doc, you got the good angle.
translation.zh:
‎-医生 你那里的角度好
‎-艾伦！

translation.en: Alan! Glad you could join us. Alan!
-Baby's a little early, but it looks good. -Oh!
translation.zh: ‎比预产期早 但孩子没事

translation.en: Your brother's been a big help.
Ethan?
-What's up, bro? -You're doing great, Marie.
translation.zh:
‎-你好吗？兄弟
‎-你做得很棒 玛丽

translation.en: Keep breathing.
Wow! The resemblance is...
[both] uncanny.
Man, we look just alike!
I mean, if somebody just... [inhales sharply]  sucked all the cool out of me,
and I was a law-abiding citizen,
and I didn't kick puppies,
-or try to drown goldfish. -[Marie] Hey!
-I'm having a baby here. If you could... -Oh, hey. Hey, honey.
translation.zh: ‎我在这儿生孩子呢 你能不能… ‎嘿 亲爱的

translation.en: -Baby. -[PA beeps] Code Red.
-Code Red. -Hi, baby. Labor and Delivery is locked down under police order.
translation.zh: ‎红色报警 根据警方命令封锁产房

translation.en: Okay. Not to make it weird, but I'mma need you to speed things up.
translation.zh:
‎好了 我不是要搞鬼
‎但我需要你加快速度

translation.en: I may be spendin' the first year of the baby's life in prison.
translation.zh:
‎孩子出世的第一年
‎我可能会待在监狱里

translation.en: -What? -No biggie. -No biggie. It's okay, baby. -[groans]
Damn. It's the po-po.
Fo sho-sho.
Why is the po-po after you?
Uh, speeding, reckless driving, possible vehicular assault.
translation.zh:
‎超速、鲁莽驾驶
‎也许还有车辆袭击

translation.en: We was in a high-speed chase.
Oh! [laughs] Respects, my G.
-What? -It's okay, we got away. Well, almost.
translation.zh:
‎-什么？
‎-没事 我们逃过了 差点

translation.en: You know what? Look here.
You gotta be here for Marie and that baby.
I'mma need your pants.
My pants?
[woman] You are doing so good. You're doing great.
Hey, Ethan.
Thank you so much, man. I really appreciate this.
Hey, man. Ain't no thang but a chicken wang.
We family, right?
Hey, about that partnership at work?
You welcome.
[sucks teeth] You feel me?
Oh! Gross.
-Hey, hey. -[shuddering breaths]
-[Marie] Hi, baby. -Hey, Ponch! John!
translation.zh:
‎-嗨 宝贝
‎-嘿 庞奇！约翰！

translation.en: Come get your boy. Come on.
-[grunts] -[both] Oh!
Okay. Oh, hey, hey. Hey, okay, okay.
-[deep breaths] -Okay, I'm here. Listen, listen.
I just want to say I'm so sorry.
Okay, I got so caught up meetin' my new family,
I forgot to appreciate the one I have right here at home.
I will never do it again, I promise.
I'm pretty sure when the drugs wear off,
I'm gonna be so mad at you, and I'mma wanna bang you in the face.
translation.zh:
‎我一定会超级生气
‎揍到你脑袋开花

translation.en: [crying] But I'm just so happy to have you here.
Always. Always.
All right, Marie. I can see the head.
translation.zh: ‎玛丽 我能看到孩子脑袋了

translation.en: Just give me one more push.
-Okay. Okay. -Ready? Come on, we'll breathe.
One, two, three.
[Russell] I watch a lot of Murder, She Wrote on this new iPad.
translation.zh:
‎我一直在用平板电脑看
‎《女作家与谋杀案》

translation.en: -Hey, Douglas. -It's like having a TV in your pocket.
translation.zh:
‎-嘿 道格拉斯
‎-就像随身带着电视机

translation.en: Babies, be careful!
Now, you know there's avocado in that nine-month layer dip.
translation.zh: ‎你们知道九层蘸酱里面有牛油果

translation.en: -I knew it. I knew it. -[spitting]
-[retches] -That is just nasty. What the hell?
Gross.
And why the hell is there nine layers in a dip?
Everybody know dip only supposed to have seven layers.
translation.zh: ‎所有人都知道蘸酱应该是七层

translation.en: [Dawn] True.
translation.zh:
‎-没错
‎-七层之后 重复放就好

translation.en: -After that, you just repeating. -Worse than being waterboarded.
translation.zh:
‎-没错
‎-七层之后 重复放就好 ‎这比受水刑还糟

translation.en: That's white people dip.
Now, Ethan, hush your mouth. You know these negroes are bougie.
translation.zh: ‎伊森 闭上你的嘴 ‎这些黑人想显摆 你懂的

translation.en: And Russell, you be careful. It makes you colic-y.
translation.zh: ‎罗素 小心点 当心婴儿肠绞痛

translation.en: -[Dawn] Eww. -Okay, Mom.
[Dawn] Why you wearing corduroy?
-You make my balls stink. -[Russell] Stop, Dawn.
translation.zh:
‎-我的裤裆都都臭了
‎-算了 道恩 ‎-我可以给你们拍照
‎-我要玩糖果棋

translation.en: -I want to play Candy Land. -Welcome to Wakanda!
translation.zh:
‎-我可以给你们拍照
‎-我要玩糖果棋 ‎欢迎来到瓦坎达

translation.en: [stammers] Uh, baby, I think I should do somethin' about the dip.
translation.zh: ‎宝贝 我似乎得调整一下蘸酱

translation.en: Who doesn't like avocado?
Oh, that's a family trait.
[chuckles] That's right, baby.
I'll help you, Mom.
-Want to take her? -Yeah.
-She's all yours. -I got her.
[Ethan] Hey, where the Domino's at?
What kind of black barbecue ain't got no damn Domino's?
translation.zh: ‎黑人烧烤怎么能没有比萨饼？

translation.en: Looks like I brought a little bit more to the table than you thought, huh?
translation.zh: ‎我带来了不少 比你想的要多 是吧？

translation.en: Well, a couple of 'em look like they should be in jail.
-Hey, man! -Candy Land! Yes, let's do this!
Should be? A couple of them have been.
But you know what? That's my family.
And I'm gonna teach this little girl to love her family unconditionally.
translation.zh:
‎我要教这个小女孩
‎无条件地爱家人

translation.en: Bro, I just want to thank you from the bottom of my heart
translation.zh: ‎兄弟 我发自内心地感激你

translation.en: for what you did for this family.
translation.zh: ‎感谢你为这个家庭做的一切

translation.en: -You gonna be an amazing daddy. -Thank you.
translation.zh: ‎你会成为一个非常棒的爸爸

translation.en: Even though our father wasn't shit.
Aw, thanks, Dawn. That was almost emotional.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢 道恩 这太感人了

translation.en: Now, as for you, Uncle Ben.
Let me tell you somethin'. I don't care what kind of judge you are,
translation.zh: ‎我告诉你 ‎我可不管你是什么法官

translation.en: Judge Judy, Judge Reinhold,
translation.zh: ‎无论你是朱迪法官 莱因霍尔德法官

translation.en: Ashley Judge, it don't make no difference to me.
translation.zh:
‎还是阿什利法官
‎对我来说没什么区别

translation.en: Don't be throwin' shade at my brother, okay?
translation.zh: ‎不要对我的兄弟不敬 懂吗？

translation.en: 'Cause I don't mind goin' to jail.
-I like jail. -Uh, easy there, easy now.
For life, bro.
For life.
-For life, sis. -That's how we do.
translation.zh:
‎-永远 姐姐
‎-我们就是这样

translation.en: -Look at me. I'm watchin' you. -[grunts]
I-I think she just threatened me, Alan.
Oh, that sounded more like a promise.
[chuckles] You want me to tell her back off?
Well, if you would be so kind. I mean...
Are you askin' me for a favor?
-Uh... what? -You know, 'cause it sounded like a favor.
translation.zh: ‎什么？ ‎听起来像是在叫我帮忙

translation.en: Oh, no. Just... just a gesture, a kind gesture on your part.
translation.zh:
‎不 这只是你的示好
‎你主动请缨的

translation.en: Well, if you're askin' me for a favor, I'd like to hear it.
translation.zh: ‎如果要我帮忙 你得说明白

translation.en: Dawn!
As a favor to me, would you ask her to back off, Alan?
translation.zh:
‎我能不能请你帮忙
‎叫她离我远点？艾伦

translation.en: I got you.
Hey, Alan! Quick, come here!
Baby Pete wants to say "hi" to his niece.
translation.zh: ‎婴儿皮特想和他的侄女打招呼

translation.en: And you could say "hi" to your kidney.
Come on, bring that little nappyhead baby on over here!
Oh, leave that baby alone.
-All right, I'm comin', I'm comin'! -Wait, wait, let me... Let me hold her.
translation.zh:
‎-好 我来了
‎-等一下 ‎让我抱抱她

translation.en: -Give my regards to Peter. -Hi, Pee-pee!
Hey, Pee-pee.
Aw, man, she got my face.
Yeah, and your height.
Salud!
Are you drinking with my kidney?
Oh, get over it, Alan. You ain't gettin' it back!
translation.zh: ‎算了吧 艾伦 你拿不回去了

translation.en: I'mma take it back.
Oh, you got to find me first!
I know exactly where he's at. His coordinates are right here.
translation.zh: ‎我知道他的位置 我有他的坐标

translation.en: I've a drone in the area. Want me to send in a strike?
translation.zh: ‎我还有无人机 可以空袭

translation.en: -I will, I could do it. -Hey, Mama.
translation.zh: ‎只要我想 不是问题 ‎嘿 妈妈

translation.en: Oh, my Lord.
Is that my Baby Pete?
Hey, Mama!
Got all my babies together at the same time?
translation.zh: ‎我的孩子们总算欢聚一堂了

translation.en: Oh, Lord heard my prayer. [sniffles]
I went to church Sunday through Wednesday for this moment.
translation.zh:
‎我整天往教堂跑
‎为求这一刻成真

translation.en: [all] Mama! Mama!
Mama's good now. Mama's good. I'm just overwhelmed with emotion.
If she dies, I get the jewelry.
She's just feelin' the spirit of the Lord.
I'm gettin' emotional here. [sniffles]
Family photo time, y'all!
If it's not on the 'Gram, it's a scam!
Now, come on, babies. Come on.
Ow! Thank you.
What'd you hit me for?
It's not nice. I'm tellin' Mother.
translation.zh: ‎这可不好 我向妈妈告状

translation.en: Mother! Ethan hit me!
I hate having brothers and sisters.
I want to be an only child again!
Bring it on in, fam. Bring it on in.
Russell, Russell, pay attention.
I want to see everybody in there. Miss Lynette, bring it in.
translation.zh: ‎大家都过来 小姐丽奈特 坐下来

translation.en: This reminds me of the school picture episode of Eight Is Enough
translation.zh:
‎这让我想起了
‎《八个够了》里拍班级合影的场景

translation.en: -where a young Nicholas Bradford-- -[all] Shut the hell up!
translation.zh:
‎年轻的都… ‎-你给我闭嘴
‎-闭嘴！罗素！

translation.en: Hush!
You shut up.
Not you, Mom.
Okay, on three, two, one...
-Family! -[blows raspberry]
